title: [SOLVED]820-2915 New batt and MB --> Slow
message:
Hi, 

Any suggestions on a (terribly) slow 820-2915? Both motherboard and battery have recently been replaced by Apple. 

Thanks, 

Rick

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 New batt and MB --> Slow
message:
Return for a warranty repair?
Run ASD and check sensor errors.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 New batt and MB --> Slow
message: Thanks. Warranty repair was rejected as the customer was too late (>3months). Will try ASD.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 New batt and MB --> Slow
message: Fixed by replacing the HDD. Thanks for your suggestions.
